title: Broccoli schema definition
description: This document describes how to interact with broccoli Job Executor system

searchDirectory.title: Directory
searchDirectory.description: Please enter the path where you want to search for files

pattern.title: Pattern
pattern.description: Please enter the pattern of the files you want to match

filterFile.title: File to read
filterFile.description: Please specify the file you want to filer

pattern.title: Matching Regex
pattern.description: This regex should match exactly what you want to extract from a file

writeFile.title: File to write
writeFile.description: Please specify the file you want to write the matching results

placeholder.title: Placeholder
placeholder.description: The placeholder you want to be replaced with the matched results

copy.title: Copy file for each Match?
copy.description: One copy of the file per regex match?

task.title: Describes a Task
task.description: A Task is a simple process holding a name, a description, steps to run a command and following Sub Tasks (Guidance Tasks)

wait.title: Wait for other Tasks, at same level, to complete
wait.description: Set it to true if this Task should wait for others to complete before moving on to guidance

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: The Timeout in seconds for the executor to trigger the kill of all processes running created for this task

preparation.title: What do you want to do?
preparation.description: What to do to before run this task. It can be a simple command, read a file line by line or search for files to process

oneOf.title: Search for files
oneOf.description: Please use '$file' placeholder in the commands section if you want to use the matched files

oneOf.title: Match lines in a file
oneOf.description: Please use '$file' placeholder in the commands section if you want to use the new files created

commands.title: Commands
commands.description: The commands, or tools, you want to execute

guidance.title: Guidance Tasks
guidance.description: Guidance defines the Sub Tasks to execute after the current Task finishes

items.title: Guidance Task
items.description: A Task is a simple process holding a name, a description, steps to run a command and following Sub Tasks (Guidance Tasks)

jobName.title: Job Name
jobName.description: The Job Name is used to identify the Job running

jobDescription.title: Job Description
jobDescription.description: The Job Description is used to provide more details on the Job to perform

workingDir.title: Working directory
workingDir.description: The root Working directory where the processor will run. All paths will be relative from here

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: The Timeout in seconds for the executor to trigger the kill of all processes running for this Job

tasks.title: Tasks
tasks.description: The Jobs to execute within this Job
